description:
This is a 20-Lesson In-Depth Overview of the Holy Spirit designed specifically for those who want to learn what the Bible has to say about this important subject. A Student Guide is included for note-taking. Each class consists of a video lecture and detailed outline to be copied into the Student Guide.

Lesson titles include:

Lesson 01 – The Personality of the Holy Spirit (Part 1)
Lesson 02 – The Personality of the Holy Spirit (Part 2)
Lesson 03 – The Deity of the Holy Spirit
Lesson 04 – The Distinctive Role of the Holy Spirit in the Godhead (Trinity)
Lesson 05 – Person & Work of the Holy Spirit as Revealed in His Names (Part 1)
Lesson 06 – Person & Work of the Holy Spirit as Revealed in His Names (Part 2)
Lesson 07 – Person & Work of the Holy Spirit as Revealed in His Names (Part 3)
Lesson 08 – Holy Spirit Convicting the World of Sin, Righteousness, & Judgment
Lesson 09 – The Holy Spirit Bearing Witness to Jesus Christ
Lesson 10 – The Regenerating Work of the Holy Spirit
Lesson 11 – The Indwelling Spirit Fully & Forever Satisfying
Lesson 12 – The Holy Spirit Forming Christ Within Us
Lesson 13 – The Holy Spirit & Sonship
Lesson 14 – The Holy Spirit as Teacher
Lesson 15 – Praying, Returning Thanks, & Worshiping in the Holy Spirit
Lesson 16 – The Holy Spirit Sending People Out to do Works of Service
Lesson 17 – The Holy Spirit’s Anointing Over the Individual Christian’s Life
Lesson 18 – The Holy Spirit Gives Power & Gifts to His Followers
Lesson 19 – The Work of the Holy Spirit in Prophets & Apostles
Lesson 20 – The Work of the Holy Spirit in Jesus Christ
title: The Holy Spirit Seminar
